title: Beauty tech 2022 trends from Mintel include metaverse, NFTs, blockchain and device innovation - CosmeticsDesign-Europe.com
content: Beauty tech 2022 trends from Mintel include metaverse, NFTs, blockchain and device innovation  CosmeticsDesign-Europe.com
description: Beauty tech is developing at a fast pace and there are plentiful opportunities for brands to play into this space, from smart consumer devices to metaverse engagement and blockchain for traceability, says Andrew McDougall, director of BPC at Mintel.
